verses.verse: Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

And early <S%G3722><s%> in the morning he came <S%G3854><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to him; and he sat <S%G2523><s%> down, <S%G2523><s%> and taught <S%G1321><s%> them.

And the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> to him a woman <S%G1135><s%> taken <S%G2638><s%> in adultery; <S%G3430><s%> and when they had set <S%G2476><s%> her in the middle, <S%G3319><s%>
They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> was taken <S%G2638><s%> in adultery, <S%G3431><s%> in the very <S%G1888><s%> act. <S%G1888><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%> commanded <S%G1781><s%> us, that such <S%G5108><s%> should be stoned: <S%G3036><s%> but what <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you?

This <S%G5124><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> tempting <S%G3985><s%> him, that they might have <S%G2192><s%> to accuse <S%G2723><s%> him. But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stooped <S%G2955><s%> down, <S%G2736><s%> and with his finger <S%G1147><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the ground, <S%G1093><s%> as though he heard <S%G191><s%> them not.

So <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> they continued <S%G1961><s%> asking <S%G2065><s%> him, he lifted <S%G352><s%> up himself, and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, He that is without <S%G361><s%> sin <S%G361><s%> among you, let him first <S%G4413><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> her.
And again <S%G3825><s%> he stooped <S%G2955><s%> down, <S%G2736><s%> and wrote <S%G1125><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the ground. <S%G1093><s%>

And they which heard <S%G191><s%> it, being convicted <S%G1651><s%> by their own conscience, <S%G4893><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out one <S%G1520><s%> by one, <S%G1520><s%> beginning <S%G756><s%> at <S%G575><s%> the oldest, <S%G4245><s%> even to the last: <S%G2078><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was left <S%G2641><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> and the woman <S%G1135><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in the middle. <S%G3319><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had lifted <S%G352><s%> up himself, and saw <S%G2300><s%> none <S%G3367><s%> but the woman, <S%G1135><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to her, Woman, <S%G1135><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> are those <S%G1565><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> accusers? <S%G2725><s%> has no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> condemned <S%G2632><s%> you?

She said, <S%G2036><s%> No <S%G3762><s%> man, <S%G3762><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to her, Neither <S%G3761><s%> do I condemn <S%G2632><s%> you: go, <S%G4198><s%> and sin <S%G264><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> more. <S%G2001><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of the world: <S%G2889><s%> he that follows <S%G190><s%> me shall not walk <S%G4043><s%> in darkness, <S%G4653><s%> but shall have <S%G2192><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You bore <S%G3140><s%> record <S%G3140><s%> of yourself; <S%G4572><s%> your record <S%G3141><s%> is not true. <S%G227><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Though <S%G2579><s%> I bear <S%G3140><s%> record <S%G3140><s%> of myself, <S%G1683><s%> yet my record <S%G3141><s%> is true: <S%G227><s%> for I know <S%G1492><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> I came, <S%G2064><s%> and where <S%G4226><s%> I go; <S%G5217><s%> but you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> tell <S%G1492><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> and where <S%G4226><s%> I go. <S%G5217><s%>
You judge <S%G2919><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh; <S%G4561><s%> I judge <S%G2919><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man. <S%G3762><s%>

And yet if <S%G1437><s%> I judge, <S%G2919><s%> my judgment <S%G2920><s%> is true: <S%G227><s%> for I am <S%G1510><s%> not alone, <S%G3441><s%> but I and the Father <S%G3962><s%> that sent <S%G3992><s%> me.
It is also <S%G2532><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in your <S%G5212><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> that the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G444><s%> is true. <S%G227><s%>
I am <S%G1510><s%> one that bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of myself, <S%G1683><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> that sent <S%G3992><s%> me bears <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of me.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> they to him, Where <S%G4226><s%> is your Father? <S%G3962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> You neither <S%G3777><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> me, nor <S%G3777><s%> my Father: <S%G3962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you had known <S%G1492><s%> me, you should have <S%G2192><s%> known <S%G1492><s%> my Father <S%G3962><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in the treasury, <S%G1049><s%> as he taught <S%G1321><s%> in the temple: <S%G2411><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> laid hands <S%G4084><s%> on him; for his hour <S%G5610><s%> was not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to them, I go <S%G5217><s%> my way, and you shall seek <S%G2212><s%> me, and shall die <S%G599><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> sins: <S%G266><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I go, <S%G5217><s%> you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Will he kill <S%G615><s%> himself? <S%G1438><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> I go, <S%G5217><s%> you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, You are from beneath; <S%G2736><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> from above: <S%G507><s%> you are of this <S%G5127><s%> world; <S%G2889><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not of this <S%G5127><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

I said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to you, that you shall die <S%G599><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> sins: <S%G266><s%> for if <S%G1437><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%> not that I am <S%G1510><s%> he, you shall die <S%G599><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> they to him, Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you? And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Even <S%G2532><s%> the same <S%G3748><s%> that I said <S%G2980><s%> to you from the beginning. <S%G746><s%>

I have <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things to say <S%G2980><s%> and to judge <S%G2919><s%> of you: but he that sent <S%G3992><s%> me is true; <S%G227><s%> and I speak <S%G3004><s%> to the world <S%G2889><s%> those <S%G5023><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of him.
They understood <S%G1097><s%> not that he spoke <S%G3004><s%> to them of the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them, When <S%G3752><s%> you have lifted <S%G5312><s%> up the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall you know <S%G1097><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%> he, and that I do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> of myself; <S%G1683><s%> but as my Father <S%G3962><s%> has taught <S%G1321><s%> me, I speak <S%G2980><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things.

And he that sent <S%G3992><s%> me is with me: the Father <S%G3962><s%> has not left <S%G863><s%> me alone; <S%G3441><s%> for I do <S%G4160><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things that please <S%G701><s%> him.
As he spoke <S%G2980><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> words, many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on him, If <S%G1437><s%> you continue <S%G3306><s%> in my word, <S%G3056><s%> then are you my disciples <S%G3101><s%> indeed; <S%G230><s%>
And you shall know <S%G1097><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> and the truth <S%G225><s%> shall make <S%G1659><s%> you free. <S%G1659><s%>

They answered <S%G611><s%> him, We be Abraham's <S%G11><s%> seed, <S%G4690><s%> and were never <S%G3762><s%> <S%G4455><s%> in bondage <S%G1398><s%> to any <S%G3762><s%> man: how <S%G4459><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you, You shall be made <S%G1096><s%> free? <S%G1658><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> commits <S%G4160><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> is the servant <S%G1401><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>
And the servant <S%G1401><s%> stays <S%G3306><s%> not in the house <S%G3614><s%> for ever: <S%G165><s%> but the Son <S%G5207><s%> stays <S%G3306><s%> ever. <S%G165><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> shall make <S%G1659><s%> you free, <S%G1659><s%> you shall be free <S%G1658><s%> indeed. <S%G3689><s%>

I know <S%G1097><s%> that you are Abraham's <S%G11><s%> seed; <S%G4690><s%> but you seek <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> me, because <S%G3754><s%> my word <S%G3056><s%> has no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G5562><s%> in you.

I speak <S%G2980><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> I have seen <S%G3708><s%> with my Father: <S%G3962><s%> and you do <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> you have seen <S%G3708><s%> with your <S%G5216><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%>

They answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Abraham <S%G11><s%> is our father. <S%G3962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, If <S%G1487><s%> you were Abraham's <S%G11><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> you would do <S%G4160><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

But now <S%G3568><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> me, a man <S%G444><s%> that has told <S%G2980><s%> you the truth, <S%G225><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have heard <S%G191><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> not Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

You do <S%G4160><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they to him, We be not born <S%G1080><s%> of fornication; <S%G4202><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> even God. <S%G2316><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, If <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> were your <S%G5216><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> you would love <S%G25><s%> me: for I proceeded <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> and came <S%G2240><s%> from God; <S%G2316><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> I of myself, <S%G1683><s%> but he sent <S%G649><s%> me.
Why <S%G1302><s%> do you not understand <S%G1097><s%> my speech? <S%G2981><s%> even because <S%G3754><s%> you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> my word. <S%G3056><s%>

You are of your <S%G5216><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> the devil, <S%G1228><s%> and the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> you will <S%G2309><s%> do. <S%G4160><s%> He was a murderer <S%G443><s%> from the beginning, <S%G746><s%> and stayed <S%G2476><s%> not in the truth, <S%G225><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> there is no <S%G3756><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> in him. When <S%G3752><s%> he speaks <S%G2980><s%> a lie, <S%G5579><s%> he speaks <S%G2980><s%> of his own: <S%G2398><s%> for he is a liar, <S%G5583><s%> and the father <S%G3962><s%> of it.
And because <S%G3754><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you the truth, <S%G225><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%> me not.
Which <S%G5101><s%> of you convinces <S%G1651><s%> me of sin? <S%G266><s%> And if <S%G1487><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> why <S%G1302><s%> do you not believe <S%G4100><s%> me?

He that is of God <S%G2316><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> words: <S%G4487><s%> you therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> them not, because <S%G3754><s%> you are not of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Say <S%G3004><s%> we not well <S%G2573><s%> that you are <S%G1488><s%> a Samaritan, <S%G4541><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> a devil? <S%G1140><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> not a devil; <S%G1140><s%> but I honor <S%G5091><s%> my Father, <S%G3962><s%> and you do dishonor <S%G818><s%> me.
And I seek <S%G2212><s%> not my <S%G3450><s%> own glory: <S%G1391><s%> there is one that seeks <S%G2212><s%> and judges. <S%G2919><s%>

Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> my saying, <S%G3056><s%> he shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> see <S%G2334><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> to him, Now <S%G3568><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that you have <S%G2192><s%> a devil. <S%G1140><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> is dead, <S%G599><s%> and the prophets; <S%G4396><s%> and you say, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> keep my saying, he shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> taste <S%G1089><s%> of death. <S%G2288><s%>

Are <S%G1488><s%> you greater <S%G3187><s%> than our father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is dead? <S%G599><s%> and the prophets <S%G4396><s%> are dead: <S%G599><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> you yourself? <S%G4572><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I honor <S%G1392><s%> myself, <S%G1683><s%> my honor <S%G1391><s%> is nothing: <S%G3762><s%> it is my Father <S%G3962><s%> that honors <S%G1392><s%> me; of whom <S%G3739><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> that he is your <S%G5216><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%>

Yet you have not known <S%G1097><s%> him; but I know <S%G1492><s%> him: and if <S%G1437><s%> I should say, <S%G3004><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> him not, I shall be a liar <S%G5583><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> to you: but I know <S%G1492><s%> him, and keep <S%G5083><s%> his saying. <S%G3056><s%>
Your <S%G5216><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> rejoiced <S%G21><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> my day: <S%G2250><s%> and he saw <S%G1492><s%> it, and was glad. <S%G5463><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> to him, You are <S%G2192><s%> not yet <S%G2532><s%> fifty <S%G4004><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> old, and have you seen <S%G3708><s%> Abraham? <S%G11><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Before <S%G4250><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> was, I am. <S%G1510><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> took <S%G142><s%> they up stones <S%G3037><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> him: but Jesus <S%G2424><s%> hid <S%G2928><s%> himself, and went <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple, <S%G2411><s%> going <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the middle <S%G3319><s%> of them, and so <S%G3779><s%> passed <S%G3855><s%> by.
